<title level="2" right="Creature 15">[Ectoplasmic Amalgam](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2430)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 34</row>

**Perception** +25; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20); (can't speak any language)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +29, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +6

**Con** +6

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 37 

**Fort** +25 

**Ref** +29 

**Will** +23 

</row>

**HP** 320
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyze](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision damage, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
physical 10

**Weaknesses**
[positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +30 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=184), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d12+14 bludgeoning plus overwhelming ectoplasm

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
ectoplasm +28 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 3d12+10 bludgeoning plus overwhelming ectoplasm

**Overwhelming Ectoplasm**   An ectoplasmic amalgam's Strikes affect [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures with the effects of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune. A creature damaged by an ectoplasmic amalgam's Strikes is [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) unless they succeed at a DC 36 Fortitude save, as the thoughts and emotions of the amalgam's constituent souls invade their mind.

**Pummeling Barrage** <actions string="Three Actions" />  The ectoplasmic amalgam attempts a melee Strike against each enemy within the amalgam's melee reach. Each attack counts toward the amalgam's multiple attack penalty but don't increase the amalgam's penalty until it has made all its attacks.

**Spew Ectoplasm** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The ectoplasmic amalgam releases a burst of ectoplasm that deals 16d6 bludgeoning damage in a 60-foot cone (DC 36 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). On a failed save, a creature is additionally [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) (or stunned 2 on a critical failure). Spew Ectoplasm functions as a [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75) effect for the purposes of affecting [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures. The ectoplasmic amalgam can't use Spew Ectoplasm again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
name: Ectoplasmic Amalgam
